name: Overrun (Shriken)
description:
Welcome to Tired Humans Inc. Megajam 2021 submission Overrun! In Overrun the underworld is running out of space and is spilling over onto your peaceful island. Grab your trusty bolt action & shotgun and survive 5 days & nights of the dead rising. 

Your play space decreases each day, you're running out of space to fight these things!

Team of 3.

Hold Tab for controls and information.

Controls:

WASD - Moves

Left Click - Shoots

Right Click - Look Ahead

F - Interact

E - Use Bandages

Objectives:

Close gates during the day and scavenge bandages & gear for the night. All closed Gates reduce their night time danger level. So close them when they open.

We hope you enjoy!

Assets Used:

Quixel Megascan meshes were used for vegetation and rocks

Quixel Megascan surfaces were used to help texture our custom models

Zombie attack animation is retargetted from https://www.mixamo.com/#/

Abandoned_car From Epic Asset Store

AnimStarterPack From Epic Asset Store 

ShirtlessZombiesPack From Epic Asset Store

Real_Recorded_Guns From Epic Asset Store 

Ultimate_Footstep_Sounds From Epic Asset Store

Extra sounds licensed from Storyblocks

"Another Typewriter" Font from https://www.dafont.com/
